body_html:
yeah! Actually if anyone is interested, I got this working :) See

https://github.com/researchapps/sherlock/blob/master/pytorch-dev/Dockerfile.py2

builds the tag "py2" here:

https://hub.docker.com/r/vanessa/pytorch-dev/tags/

and some unecessary verbosity (with the Dockerfile.py2) here:

https://github.com/researchapps/sherlock/tree/master/pytorch-dev
